Package com.intellij.psi

Interface PsiCodeBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iconable, PsiElement, PsiModifiableCodeBlock, UserDataHolder
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JspCodeBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrSyntheticCodeBlock, PsiCodeBlockImpl

    public interface PsiCodeBlock
extends PsiElement, PsiModifiableCodeBlock
    Represents a Java code block, usually surrounded by curly braces.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.util.Iconable

        Iconable.IconFlags, Iconable.LastComputedIcon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PsiCodeBlock[] EMPTY_ARRAY
      The empty array of PSI code blocks which can be reused to avoid unnecessary allocations.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.psi.PsiElement

        ARRAY_FACTORY

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.util.Iconable

        ICON_FLAG_IGNORE_MASK, ICON_FLAG_OPEN, ICON_FLAG_READ_STATUS, ICON_FLAG_VISIBILITY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PsiElement getFirstBodyElement()
      Returns the first PSI element contained in the block.
      PsiElement getLastBodyElement()
      Returns the last PSI element contained in the block.
      PsiJavaToken getLBrace()
      Returns the opening curly brace of the block.
      PsiJavaToken getRBrace()
      Returns the closing curly brace of the block.
      default int getStatementCount() 
      PsiStatement [] getStatements()
      Returns the array of statements contained in the block.
      Please note that this method doesn't return comments which are not part of statements.
      default boolean isEmpty()

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_ARRAY

        static final PsiCodeBlock[] EMPTY_ARRAY
        The empty array of PSI code blocks which can be reused to avoid unnecessary allocations.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatements

        PsiStatement [] getStatements()
        Returns the array of statements contained in the block.
        Please note that this method doesn't return comments which are not part of statements.
        Returns:
        the array of statements.

      • getFirstBodyElement

        PsiElement getFirstBodyElement()
        Returns the first PSI element contained in the block.
        Returns:
        the first PSI element, or null if the block is empty.

      • getLastBodyElement

        PsiElement getLastBodyElement()
        Returns the last PSI element contained in the block.
        Returns:
        the last PSI element, or null if the block is empty.

      • getLBrace

        PsiJavaToken getLBrace()
        Returns the opening curly brace of the block.
        Returns:
        the opening curly brace, or null if the block does not have one.

      • getRBrace

        PsiJavaToken getRBrace()
        Returns the closing curly brace of the block.
        Returns:
        the closing curly brace, or null if the block does not have one.

      • getStatementCount

        default int getStatementCount()
        Returns:
        number of statements this code block contains.

      • isEmpty

        default boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if this code block contains no statements. Note that if code block contains empty statements or empty code blocks inside, this method will return false.
